body:

subject: Re:    ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your willingness to share information, but I have a few questions before proceeding. Could you please clarify what exactly you need assistance with regarding opening an online account in the US? Additionally, could you provide more details about the process and any requirements involved?

Best wishes,
Carla
